title: Prohibits insurers from refusing to issue or renew, cancel, or charge or impose an increased premium for certain policies based on the breed of a dog owned
summary: Prohibits insurers from refusing to issue or renew, cancel, or charge or impose a reasonably increased premium for homeowners' insurance policies based on the breed of a dog owned.

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-

    4  HOMEOWNERS' INSURANCE POLICIES AS DEFINED IN SECTION TWO THOUSAND  THREE
